home.heroSubtitle:
Live the unexpected without improvising. We design your trip
and reveal the destination 48 hours before.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Your next unforgettable memory is just one click away. Don't think twice.
home.howItWorksNote: * The destination is revealed 48 hours before to preserve the surprise. Guide and checklist are sent.

howItWorksSteps.title: PLAN
howItWorksSteps.description: Choose dates, origin city, duration and budget. Add filters and mood if you like.

howItWorksSteps.title: GET THE SURPRISE
howItWorksSteps.description: Confirm your trip. We reveal the destination 48 hours before and send you the guide for that mood.

howItWorksSteps.title: TRAVEL STRESS-FREE
howItWorksSteps.description: Pack your bags. Flights and accommodation ready; human support when you need it.

home.howItWorksSubtitle: Three steps. Zero stress. More discovery.

benefitsSteps.title: stress-free and flexible
benefitsSteps.description: You say how much you want to spend and when; with options and filters to tailor the surprise to you. We take care of the rest.

benefitsSteps.title: All taken care of
benefitsSteps.description: Flights and accommodation aligned to your budget and travel style.

benefitsSteps.title: authentic discovery
benefitsSteps.description: Experience the thrill of the unexpected with real curation, not random.

footer.tagline: Where the routine ends, the adventure begins.
